title: NFL Mock Draft Monday: Should Redskins deal 2nd pick? AFC East Team Needs (Football 2/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by NFL Draft experts Ryan Wilson and Josh Edwards for the 2nd 'Mock Draft Monday' of 2020. The guys analyze the possibility of the Redskins trading out of the #2 pick (7:30), while also checking in on the Lions quarterback situation (17:15), Ohio's NFL teams (20:20) and Justin Herbert (26:30). Then, Will, Ryan and Josh break down the most glaring needs for the Patriots (30:30), Dolphins (34:30), Bills (40:15) and Jets (46:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @JEdwarCBS
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
